timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-07-25T11:48:29", "sender_email": "adelechoong@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Fwd: Lease Agreement for Chapter Kings Cross", "message": "---------- Forwarded message ---------\\nFrom: Joanne Khow <[joannekhow@gmail.com]()>\\nDate: Fri, 25 Jul 2025 at 7:38\u202fPM\\nSubject: Fwd: Lease Agreement for Chapter Kings Cross\\nTo: <[Adelechoong@gmail.com]()>\\n\\nJoanne Khow-Teoh\\n\\n---------- Forwarded message ---------\\nFrom: <[kingscross@chapter-living.com]()>\\nDate: Thu, 24 Jul 2025 at 12:35\\nSubject: Lease Agreement for Chapter Kings Cross\\nTo: <[joannekhow@gmail.com]()>\\n\\n[Chapter Kings Cross student accommodations]()\\n\\nLease Agreement for Oi Yoke Khow\\n\\nTo: [joannekhow@gmail.com]()\\nDear Oi Yoke,\\n\\nLease documents for Choong Jia En at Chapter Kings Cross are ready for your signature! Click on the link below to log in and follow the instructions to review and sign. If you have any questions, or need help along the way, contact the leasing office at 020 3675 9200.\\nLogin ID: [joannekhow@gmail.com]()\\nPassword: e9d296\\n[Click here]() to review and sign your lease.\\n\\nPlease retain for your records.\\n\\nIs this email not displaying correctly?\\n[View it in your browser]()\\n[]", "snippet": "---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Joanne Khow <joannekhow@gmail.com> Date: Fri, 25 Jul 2025 at 7:38 PM Subject: Fwd: Lease Agreement for Chapter Kings Cross To: <Adelechoong@gmail.", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "adelechoong@gmail.com"}

{"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-07-25T11:48:40", "sender_email": "adelechoong@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Fwd: FW: Rental Application for Chapter Kings Cross", "message": "---------- Forwarded message ---------\\nFrom: Terence Choong (Dita Racing) <[terence@ditaracing.com]()>\\nDate: Fri, 25 Jul 2025 at 7:45\u202fPM\\nSubject: FW: Rental Application for Chapter Kings Cross\\nTo: <[adelechoong@gmail.com]()>\\n\\nTerence Choong\\nDita Racing Sdn. Bhd.\\n\\n-------- Original message --------\\nFrom: [kingscross@chapter-living.com]()\\nDate: 24/07/2025 12:36\u202fpm (GMT+08:00)\\nTo: [terence@ditaracing.com]()\\nSubject: Rental Application for Chapter Kings Cross\\n\\n[Chapter Kings Cross student accommodations]()\\n\\nHi Yeow Tuck,\\n\\nChoong Jia En submitted a rental application at Chapter Kings Cross and included you as a Guarantor. We need to collect additional information from you in order to finalise Choong Jia En\u2018s application.\\n\\nTo create an account, [Click Here](). Your email address is your username and you can provide a unique password when prompted.\\nIf you have any questions, or need help along the way, contact the leasing office at 020 3675 9200.\\n\\nLogin ID:\\t[terence@ditaracing.com]()\\nPassword:\\tPlease [click here]() to create a password and begin your online application.\\n\\nThank you!\\nChapter Kings Cross\\n\\nPlease retain for your records.\\n\\n[Terms and Conditions]().\\n\\nIs this email not displaying correctly?\\n[View it in your browser]()\\n[]", "snippet": "---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Terence Choong (Dita Racing) <terence@ditaracing.com> Date: Fri, 25 Jul 2025 at 7:45 PM Subject: FW: Rental Application for Chapter Kings Cross To:", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "adelechoong@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Hello? Yeah, hello, am I speaking with Chongji here? Yeah, hello Rishabh, the site calling you from AMB Student. Go on. Yeah, so Chong, I just wanted to confirm here. I can see that you have filled the booking form for Moonraker Point, correct? Yeah. So just wanted to confirm which kind of payment plan that you wish to proceed with. Because this property offers forced installment without a UK based guarantor. So means that anyone from your family, be it your father or mother, can become the guarantor for you and you can pay the rent in for installment or either. The second option is upfront payment, means that you have to pay for the whole amount of weeks upfrontly before moving in into the property. So which payment method that you want to go for? Not decided. I think we just started looking today. We have not decided on which one we want to go with. I think it's too, too soon for us to be deciding on the payment method. Okay, so let me tell you one thing here. Majority of the properties are already being sold out. I'll do one thing here. I'll share you some more option with the same price range along with a good location, good property, good reviews on your WhatsApp so that you will have sufficient time to explore the other options as well. Okay. Yeah, the budget would be. Yeah, please tell me, go ahead. Can I tell you like my preferences for like. Yes, yes, please, please, please, please, please. I would prefer a private bathroom and one that's near ucl. Okay. And what about the kitchen? Sharing kitchen is fine. Yeah. And what's the budget that you'll be looking for? 350. 350. Got it, got it. 350 pounds. Yeah, that can work. And 350 pounds. And along with that you're looking for a 44 weeks tenancy or 51 weeks tenants. 44, 44 weeks. Okay, so just allow me some time to get this checked and then I will share you the option very soon. Okay. Can I, can I just ask right, these studios or these units that we have seen, they are all in an apartment, right? So if it's shared kitchen is usually shared with how many other students? On an average basis the number of sharing kitchen is 4 to 5. In some cases it is 6 to 7 as well. Okay, so I will try to find your property, either an ensuite because see I can also try to find you a studio room where everything will be private. Beat room, washroom, kitchen. But that can be slightly higher to 350. It can be 400 or 420. So I'll do one thing here. I'll check all the available option. If I'm able to find any studio rooms as well within the price range of your, I will share that to you as well. Okay. Okay. See, the average number here is four to five students. Okay. All right. Thank you. Thank you. You're welcome. I'll be sharing you the options very soon on your WhatsApp. Okay. Thank you. Welcome to Papa. Hi.
